sent.desc: Render as a sent message (so from current user)

bg-color.desc: Color name (from the Quasar Color Palette) for chat bubble background

text-color.desc: Color name (from the Quasar Color Palette) for chat bubble text

avatar.desc: URL to the avatar image of the author

text.desc: Array of strings that are the message body. Strings are not sanitized (see details in docs)

label-sanitize.desc: Force use of textContent instead of innerHTML to render label; Use it when the label might be unsafe (from user input)

name-sanitize.desc: Force use of textContent instead of innerHTML to render name; Use it when the name might be unsafe (from user input)

text-sanitize.desc: Force use of textContent instead of innerHTML to render text; Use it when the text might be unsafe (from user input)

stamp-sanitize.desc: Force use of textContent instead of innerHTML to render stamp; Use it when the stamp might be unsafe (from user input)

default.desc: You can use this slot to define a custom message (overrides props)

avatar.desc: Slot for avatar; Suggestion: QAvatar, img
